text: Ezɨ Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba Israelian mɨdorozir gumazir avɨribav soghezɨ me ariaghire. Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba bar puvɨra me gamua, me dɨkabɨra me gamima me nguazir mɨnemniamɨn mɨn otifi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, dughiar kamɨn, Joahas mɨdorozir gumazir avɨriba puvatɨ. Israelia datɨrɨghɨn 50plan mɨdorozir gumazir hoziabagh apia mɨsozibara iti. Egha me mɨsoghamin 10plan karisba ikia, egha 10,000plan mɨdorozir gumazir igharaziba iti.
